alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Price; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 1:54PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL BAYFIELD, SOUTHWESTERN ASHLAND, NORTHWESTERN PRICE AND SAWYER COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM CDT... At 154 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Couderay, to near Winter, to 12 miles northwest of Hawkins, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Winter around 200 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Round Lake and Chippewa Flowage East. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
